message.content:
cs.CV, cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.MM, cs.LG 

The paper focuses on the development of a large-scale optical character recognition (OCR) system for processing images uploaded daily at Facebook scale. This involves modeling techniques for efficient detection and recognition of text in images, which falls under the computer vision (cs.CV) and information retrieval (cs.IR) sub-categories. Additionally, the understanding of textual information in image content is important for search and recommendation applications, which relates to natural language processing (cs.CL) and multimedia (cs.MM) sub-categories. Finally, the paper discusses the system architecture and evaluation of the presented technologies, which involves machine learning (cs.LG) techniques.
